name: Bad Medicine: Infectious Teachers
storyline:
"He" was a rational teacher that you looked up to...or at least he was.

There was a dark classroom that one must never set foot into. In there are extremely dangerous special lessons with the teachers.

When you realize the true forms of the teachers.... will you be able to handle it?
